attributes.action: encourage retailers and producers, by whatever means available, to reduce the amount of packaging used for their products.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The consumer is constantly hounded and critisised for the amount of rubbish that we 'produce'. Surely the first rule of recycling is dont use it in the first place! The obvious spin off is a cleaner environment, less energy used to produce something and yes - less rubbish!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
